name: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2: World Hunter Pack
detailed_description: The „World Hunter Pack” is the third downloadable content pack for Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2. This multiplayer-centric expansion contains four all new maps for both Team Deathmatch and Squad Deathmatch modes. “Jungle Camping” and „Industrial District” (Squad DM) plus „CQC Hotel” and “Forest Pursuit” (Team DM) offer unique gameplay experiences, from smaller action heavy arenas to large open zones for the most meticulous players.
